
### POSIX error handling  {.smaller}


* most commonly POSIX functions return -1 on error 

   * some exceptions; check <code>man function_name</code>

* usually set variable <code>errno</code> 

   * what went wrong?

* tools for using <code>errno</code>  

   * <code>strerror(errno)</code> --- human-readable error string
   * <code>perror("name")</code> --- print ‘name: <i>error</i>’ to stderr
